title: New Loading Screen
body:
Its not bad! I like the new features.

But the text is tiny, the ping at the top left is constantly flickering, not indicative of actual ping I get in the game.
Also the loading bar at the bottom is tiny too, I barely noticed it.

replies.body: I hate that I can't see who has a toaster.

No toaster-ism allowed here sir.

Really though, it's a lot easier to look at one bar/number than at 10 to work out roughly how long a load is going to be.
